abstract: With the impending departure of NBC Universal chief Jeff Zucker, his replacement, Comcast chief operating officer Steve Burke, is coming to the fore after years of deal-making for the cable giant.
snippet: With the impending departure of NBC Universal chief Jeff Zucker, his replacement, Comcast chief operating officer Steve Burke, is coming to the fore after years of deal-making for the cable giant.
lead_paragraph: After last week’s announcement that Jeff Zucker would leave NBC Universal after its sale to Comcast is complete, it took no one by surprise when Comcast‘s chief operating officer, Steve Burke, was named to replace him.

headline.main: With NBC, Comcast’s Burke Gets the Spotlight
